cvaa.label: Closed captions options menu
cvaa.description: Adds closed captions options menu which extends existing styling.

cvaaBtnPosition.label: Button position
cvaaBtnPosition.doc: Captions position within the captions menu. possible options are first and last

useCookie.doc: Should cookies be used to store user settings. if not used, settings will be set to default upon page refresh

cvaaDefaultSettings.label: Default settings
cvaaDefaultSettings.doc: Initial styling configuration options, if cookies are disabled these options will be set upon page refresh.
